pages.text: Scattered around the world you have discovered numerous geodes, which produce not only colored gems, but also valuable resources.

pages.title: Auto-Harvesting
pages.text: The [Crystal Apothecary](book://magic/crystal_apothecary) is able to harvest [#](bb00bb)Crystals[#]() automatically - even if you are not near those geodes at all!

pages.title: Moving Budding Blocks
pages.text: Tools enchanted with [Resonance](book://enchantments/resonance) are able to harvest Budding Blocks.
